title: Champion Mastery Bug
body:
Its not a game changing bug but its funny and thought i might share its hard to explain ill try and do a video on it but so far this is what i told my friend hope you understand and I've put some examples of some rioters champion masteries you go to someones profile then quickly change from match history then League and go onto yours then quickly click Champions if done fast enough it will show their Champion Mastery.
In these pictures you can see its my profile but i have other persons masteries http://imgur.com/a/BjbpR 
First picture is of my champion mastery with level 5 anivia and rengar etc. 
I'll try and do a video later if people can't get it to work, Im on a macbook if that helps probs not
https://youtu.be/ra5ZIm5lJyo  Here is the video
